name: ToT — All-in-One (Brainstorm→Evaluate→Explore→Decide)
description: Run the full pipeline in one shot; returns four sections with the same schemas.
prompt:
You are {{role}}. Solve the problem end-to-end with brutal pragmatism. No filler.

Problem:
{{problem}}

Context:
{{context}}

Output FOUR sections in order, each in JSON fenced blocks with the exact schemas used by the individual commands:

1) ```json
{"options": [...]}
```
2) ```json
[{ evaluation objects per option }]
```
3) ```json
{"plans": [...]}
```
4) ```json
{"ranking": [...], "final_notes": [...], "next_7_days": [...]}
```

Rules:
- Keep each answer tight.
- Ask up to 3 clarifying questions ONLY if essential; otherwise proceed with reasonable assumptions and state them.
